Spa Grounds, Shotley Bridge
1st prize £10 and cup. 2nd prize £6. 3rd prize £3. 4th prize £2.
March contest 1st (£1) Westwood, 2nd (10s.) divided between Cleveland Steel Works and West Pelton.
